short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes X.com/Twitter inline images and videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to block inline images and videos on Twitter.

      For now you can only remove them completely, but working on replacing them
      with links as an option.
